name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-bubble-template
title: React Bubble Template
shortDescription: Displays SharePoint list items as interactive circular bubbles. Each bubble can show an optional logo, title, optional description and act as a link. The bubbles use customizable background and text colors, and a soft shadow to give a lifted appearance. On hover bubbles gently enlarge and return to their original size.
longDescription: Displays SharePoint list items as interactive circular bubbles. Each bubble can show an optional logo, title, optional description and act as a link. The bubbles use customizable background and text colors, and a soft shadow to give a lifted appearance. On hover bubbles gently enlarge and return to their original size.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
